NLP Pipeline

  • View page source

Demo Interface (src/demo)

This module provides an interactive demo interface for emotion classification using Gradio, as well as a Python client for REST API calls.

Gradio UI

Launches a local UI where users can test predictions on text/audio:

python src/demo/app_ui.py

Supports: - Text input - Audio (MP3/WAV) upload - Optional transcription with AssemblyAI

API Client

src.demo.api_client.classify_audio(file_path: str)[source]

Classify emotion from audio file.

Parameters:

file_path (str) – Path to audio file.

Returns:

Top 10 predictions and path to full CSV file.

Return type:

tuple

src.demo.api_client.classify_text(text: str) → str[source]

Classify emotion from text using FastAPI.

Parameters:

text (str) – Input sentence.

Returns:

Predicted emotion and confidence.

Return type:

str

src.demo.api_client.classify_url(media_url: str, language: str = 'auto')[source]

Classify emotion from media URL.

Parameters:

  • media_url (str) – Media link (YouTube, MP3, MP4).

  • language (str) – Optional transcription language.

Returns:

Top 10 predictions and path to full CSV file.

Return type:

tuple

src.demo.api_client.classify_video(file_path: str)[source]

Classify emotion from video file.

Parameters:

file_path (str) – Path to video file.

Returns:

Top 10 predictions and path to full CSV file.

Return type:

tuple

src.demo.api_client.log_event(event: str)[source]

Log frontend usage events.

Parameters:

event (str) – Description of the event.

A lightweight client for sending text/audio to the /predict/ FastAPI endpoint.

Gradio Assets

Includes: - certificate.pem (for HTTPS) - requirements.txt for UI deployment
